price: 23. Naast Allah, en leid hen naar de weg van het laaiende vuur.
arabic: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ فَٱهۡدُوهُمۡ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: min dūni al-lahi fa-ih'dūhum ilā ṣirāṭi al-jaḥīmi
